#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main(){
    int t,i,count;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        count=0;
        string str;
        cin>>str;
        sort(str.begin(),str.end());
        for(i=0;i<str.length();){
            if(i==str.length()-1){
                count++;
                break;
            }
            if(str.at(i)==str.at(i+1)){
                count++;
                i+=2;
            }else{
                count++;
                i++;
            }
        }
        cout<<count<<endl;
    }
}
